title: eTTa irundu pEsum kaNNA
sahitya:
eTTa irundu pEsum kaNNA eTTik-kani pazhuttu yArukkenna tolaivil


anupallavi

  eTTa irundu pEshum kiTTi varAmalE un cuTTittanamellAm dUrak-kaTTi vaitti
				(kuntalavarALi)


caraNam 1    kaLLam kapaTariyA nAnE anru un kAlinilE vizhundEnE 
uLLam ariyAdirundEnE inru uNmaiyellAm kaNdarindEnE
				(bEgaDa)
    caraNam 2    veTkam viTTu ingu vandIrE nAnum vENdumenbadai marandIrE 
iSTam unniDattil enrIrE adai ittanai nAL irundIrE kaNNA
				(aThANA)
    caraNam 3    kALinganai venrAlenna kalangi viDuvEnO kamsanaik-konrAlenna kAdaluruvEnO 
mALikkum un pugazh mayangi viDuvEnO vArAdIr ennaip-pArAdIr kaNNA
			(simhEndramadhyam)
    caraNam 4    kannattilE kumkuma karai paDittirukkudE kaNgaLil shivappAgha kalakkamirukkudE 
vaNNa vaNNa mEniyellAm vATTamuTrirukkudE vambugaL pEshAdIr vArtaigaL vIshAdIr
